div.p: The status of a diagnostic order
This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/diagnostic-order-status

tr.td: The receiving system has received the order, but not yet decided whether it will be performed
The receiving system has accepted the order, but work has not yet commenced
The work to fulfill the order is happening
The work is complete, and the outcomes are being reviewed for approval
The work has been complete, the report(s) released, and no further work is planned
The request has been held by originating system/user request
The receiving system has declined to fulfill the request
The diagnostic investigation was attempted, but due to some procedural error, it could not be completed

description.value: The status of a diagnostic order

definition.value: The receiving system has received the order, but not yet decided whether it will be performed

The diagnostic investigation was attempted, but due to some procedural error, it could not be completed
